name: Rolling Odyssey
description:
Roll a ball and finish the levels! See how quickly you can go.

This is a little game I put together over a couple days... mostly to avoid doing work that I should be doing. It turned out to be kinda fun, so I put it up here.

WARNING: Early, early prototype. There isn't much playtime yet... If there is enough interest, I'll make some more levels and add features.

Controls:

  • Arrow keys to roll
  • Space to jump
  • R to restart the level
  • Escape to quit to the menu

There is no high-score system, so post your best times in the comments! Unless you don't want to... which is fine too.
